text: @PressSec Breaks my heart (BMH) to see a death toll from COVID-19 continue to rise while Trump & his administration pretends everything is 👍. BMH we have a #RacistInChief in the WH who refuses to support #BlackLivesMattter, BMH Trump & GOP IGNORE #RussianBounty warnings! #VoteBlue2020
